name: Draw 'n' Go: Awesomeness!
description:
☆THE STORY: TROLOLo (:
A high-quality graphics, unique physics and dozens of wonderful missions are waiting for you!
Draw your way to the victory!

☆EASY AND FUNNY GAMEPLAY☆
Jump to the finish by drawing road on the screen with your finger!
Recommended for people who like PHYSICS GAMES!

☆YOU CAN SEE☆
√11 game worlds and over 110 original levels
√Challenging game physics
√Easy game operating
√The world high-scores!
√Unique graphics
√HD Quality Music, for every world
√Free updates with new worlds and maps are waiting for you

☆UPCOMING FEATURES☆
√New WORLDs
√Themselves draw new levels

iscientist review:
graphics - 8/10
features - 8/10
Sound - 9/10
Idea - 7/10
-----------------
Final Score - 9.5/10

*Music and sounds by Dargalon and KevinMcLein
